spec_data.Name: perl-MouseX-Foreign
spec_data.Description:
MouseX::Foreign Perl module provides an ability for Mouse classes to extend
any classes, including non-Mouse classes, including Moose classes.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:10:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Extends non-Mouse classes as well as Mouse classes
